mapper.select:
SELECT dbCode , hospitalId , patientId , dName , dCode , dDate , pDoctor , adminId , drDate
FROM jindanh

SELECT dbCode , hospitalId , patientId , dName , dCode , dDate , pDoctor , adminId , drDate
FROM jindanh where patientId = #{patientId}
mapper.insert: REPLACE INTO jindan SELECT dbCode , hospitalId , patientId , dName , dCode , dDate , pDoctor , adminId , drDate FROM jindanh WHERE patientId = #{patientId}
mapper.select: SELECT dbCode , hospitalId , patientId , dName , dCode , dDate , pDoctor , adminId , drDate FROM jindan
